SA20bsa023_u:5: santānasyāniyamaśca yuktā kṛtyakriyā na ca // Vk_2 //
SA20bsa023_u:10: tiraścāṃ sambhavaḥ svarge yathā na narake tathā /
SA20bsa023_u:11: na pretānāṃ yatastajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // Vk_5 //
SA20bsa023_u:13: iṣyate pariṇāmaśca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // Vk_6 //
SA20bsa023_u:15: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇam // Vk_7 //
SA20bsa023_u:22: na tadekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA20bsa023_u:23: na ca te saṃhatā yasmāt paramāṇurna sidhyati // Vk_11 //
SA20bsa023_u:27: na cānavayavatvena tatsaṃyogo na sidhyati // Vk_13 //
SA20bsa023_u:29: chāyāvṛtī kathaṃ vānyo na piṇḍaścenna tasya te // Vk_14 //
SA20bsa023_u:31: vicchinnānekavṛttiśca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // Vk_15 //
SA20bsa023_u:32: pratyakṣabuddhiḥ svapnādau yathā sā ca yadā tadā /
SA20bsa023_u:33: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ matam // Vk_16 //
SA20bsa023_u:34: uktaṃ yathā tadābhāsā vijñaptiḥ smaraṇaṃ tataḥ /
SA20bsa023_u:37: middhenopahataṃ cittaṃ svapne tenāsamaṃ phalam // Vk_18 //
SA20bsa023_u:41: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // Vk_20 //
SA20bsa023_u:45: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā buddhagocaraḥ // Vk_22 //
